articles.title: Kumar Sangakkara's tenure as MCC president to be extended to September 2021 - India Today
articles.description: Kumar Sangakkara will become the first MCC President to serve more than a year's time since World War II as the Covid-19 situation has led the MCC committee to invite the Sri Lanka great for another term.
articles.content:
Former Sri Lanka captain Kumar Sangakkara will continue to serve as the president of the Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) for another year due to 'extraordinary circumstances' in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic

articles.description: The Covid-19 pandemic has seized all sporting activities around the globe and thrown deeper questions to the authority to minimize contact.
